Package dao

Class PersonsDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.PersonsDAO
public class PersonsDAO
extends java.lang.Object

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.sql.Connection databaseConnection
    A Connection object that establishes connection to the Persons SQL Database for data access operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PersonsDAO​(java.sql.Connection databaseConnection)
    Constructor for the PersonsDAO class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPerson​(Persons person)
    The addPerson method takes a Person object as a parameter and adds it into the connected SQL Database with SQL queries.
    void clearPersonsTable()
    clearUsersTable method uses a SQL update to clear all records from the Persons table
    void clearUserPersonsTable​(java.lang.String username)
    clearUserPersonsTable clears only records from the Persons table in the SQL Database that have the same AssociatedUsername as the requesting User.
    Persons findPerson​(java.lang.String personID)
    The findPerson method takes a String personID as parameter and searches the connected database for a Person object that matches the personID.
    java.util.List<Persons> findPersonByUser​(java.lang.String associatedUsername)
    The method findPersonByUser accesses and returns a list of Persons items that contain the username of the requesting user in the associatedUsername field.
    int getTableCount()
    getTableCount method uses a SQL Query to get the row count for the Persons table.
    void removePerson​(java.lang.String personID)
    The removePerson method takes a personID String object as a parameter and locates its in the database and removes the associated fields from the database.

  • Field Details

    • databaseConnection

      private java.sql.Connection databaseConnection
      A Connection object that establishes connection to the Persons SQL Database for data access operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonsDAO

      public PersonsDAO​(java.sql.Connection databaseConnection)
      Constructor for the PersonsDAO class. Sets databaseConnection to make connection with Persons SQL database.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnection - The access information for the Persons SQL database.

  • Method Details

    • addPerson

      public void addPerson​(Persons person) throws DataAccessException
      The addPerson method takes a Person object as a parameter and adds it into the connected SQL Database with SQL queries.
      Parameters:
      person - The Person object to be added to the database.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • removePerson

      public void removePerson​(java.lang.String personID) throws DataAccessException
      The removePerson method takes a personID String object as a parameter and locates its in the database and removes the associated fields from the database.
      Parameters:
      personID - The personID of the Person object to be removed from the database.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • findPerson

      public Persons findPerson​(java.lang.String personID) throws DataAccessException
      The findPerson method takes a String personID as parameter and searches the connected database for a Person object that matches the personID.
      Parameters:
      personID - The personID String to be searched for in the database.
      Returns:
      Persons object from the database that matches the personID taken as a parameter.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException

    • findPersonByUser

      public java.util.List<Persons> findPersonByUser​(java.lang.String associatedUsername) throws DataAccessException
      The method findPersonByUser accesses and returns a list of Persons items that contain the username of the requesting user in the associatedUsername field.
      Parameters:
      associatedUsername - The username to base the SQL WHERE statement on.
      Returns:
      A List of Persons items that all match the criteria of having the same AssociatedUserName that is passed in as a parameter
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - When there is an issue in connecting to the SQL Database

    • clearPersonsTable

      public void clearPersonsTable() throws DataAccessException
      clearUsersTable method uses a SQL update to clear all records from the Persons table
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Throws DataAccessException when connection to database fails.

    • clearUserPersonsTable

      public void clearUserPersonsTable​(java.lang.String username) throws DataAccessException
      clearUserPersonsTable clears only records from the Persons table in the SQL Database that have the same AssociatedUsername as the requesting User. Used as a part of the FillService class in the /Fill web API.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the for whom all associated Persons will be deleted for.
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Exception Thrown when there is an error in connecting to the database.

    • getTableCount

      public int getTableCount() throws DataAccessException
      getTableCount method uses a SQL Query to get the row count for the Persons table.
      Returns:
      An integer variable containing the current row count for the table
      Throws:
      DataAccessException - Throws an exception when connection to the database fails.
